According to CEO Sergio Marchionne , the improvement was achieved primarily through improving manufacturing efficiency, increasing attention to product quality, and pushing new products to market. Rep. Mike Pence ( R-IN) said he was nearing a decision on his political future, the Indianapolis Star reports. A run for Indiana governor is also a possibility. Said Mike Pence : We've been trying to listen first to Hoosiers and then to other voices around the country about where they think we might best serve in the years ahead.
